Apple quarterly profit, revenue top Wall Street targets but China lagsApple on Thursday reported sales and profit that beat Wall Street estimates, powered by growth in its iPhone business. But China sales missed analysts' targets. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 21:30:41 GMT EW4XPZ5BDNOVFBO47XHRLM3NPI https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-quarterly-profit-revenue-top-wall-street-targets-china-layers-2024-02-01/Stephen Nellis技术
Algeria pushes UN Security Council to demand Gaza ceasefireAlgeria has drafted a U.N. Security Council resolution to demand an immediate humanitarian ceasefire between Israel and Hamas, a move that the United States - a council veto power - opposes because it says it would only benefit the Palestinian militants. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:38:02 GMT RULEX6HHWRK6NZYK3OIPWOB7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/algeria-pushes-a-security-council-demand-for-gaza-ceasefire-2024-02-01/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
Tesla opens first South America store in Chilean capitalTesla opened its first South American store this week, displaying its sleek electric vehicles (EVs) at an upscale mall in Chile's capital Santiago, as the automaker grapples with a slowdown in EV demand and the growth of Chinese rivals. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:25:16 GMT BGGZR6你的房间LF3RZLPCE6MJQ https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/tesla-opens-first-south-america-large-chilean-capital-2024-02-01/Jorge Vega商业汽车与交通
Volvo's Polestar troubles signal 'shakeout time' for EV industryThe shakeout in the global electric-vehicle industry is picking up speed. Saudi Arabia has not yet joined BRICS - Saudi official sourceSaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the group last year, a Saudi official source told Reuters. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:49:15 GMT FWH3ORE4PBJRHDECEND7PVIB2U https://www.reuters.com/world/saudi-arabia-has-not-yet-joined-brics-saudi-official-source-2024-02-01/Reuters世界
Russia has no plans to deploy nuclear arms beyond Belarus, says deputy ministerRussia will not deploy nuclear weapons abroad except in its ally Belarus but will find ways to counter any deployment of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons in Britain, the deputy minister in charge of arms control said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:01:34 GMT C7O2GLZFYZN6FBBA66WELYNREU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-no-plans-to-deploy-nuclear-arms-beyond-belarus-says-deputy-minister-2024-02-01/Dmitry Antonov, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
